paragraphs.title: Top ten states that tweeted about Tax Reform
paragraphs.text:
%drill
select location,count(distinct(id)) as c from dfs.tmp.tview where location like '%USA%' and location not like 'USA' and lower(text) like '%tax%' group by location order by c desc limit 10

msg.data:
location	c
California, USA	614
Florida, USA	395
Texas, USA	382
New York, USA	254
New Jersey, USA	169
Pennsylvania, USA	158
Ohio, USA	148
Michigan, USA	141
Virginia, USA	137
North Carolina, USA	137

paragraphs.title: Total tweets and location by the hours in the US (UTC)
paragraphs.text:
%drill
select `hour`,count(distinct(location)) as `location count`,count(distinct(id)) as `tweet count` from dfs.tmp.tview where location like '%USA%' and tweet_time >= DATE_SUB(current_timestamp, interval '48' hour) group by `hour`

paragraphs.title: Hashtags
paragraphs.text:
%drill
select hashtags,count(distinct(id)) as `count` from dfs.tmp.tview where hashtags not like 'NULL'  group by hashtags order by `count` limit 10

msg.data:
hashtags	count
           NorthKorea KimJongUn	1
             XiJinping Trump	1

paragraphs.title: Top ten users by followers count
paragraphs.text:
%drill

select screen_name,max(followers_count) as maxcount from dfs.tmp.tview group by screen_name order by maxcount desc limit 10

paragraphs.title: Creating Hive External Table Mapped to MapR-DB
paragraphs.text:
%hive
DROP TABLE mytweets;
CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE mytweets ( 
 text string, 
 ts string, 
 screen_name string, 
 followers_count int,
 retweet_count int,
 location string,
 hashtag string,
 utc_offset string,
 time_zone string,
 tid string) 
STORED BY 'org.apache.hadoop.hive.maprdb.json.MapRDBJsonStorageHandler' 
TBLPROPERTIES("maprdb.table.name" = "/tmp/tweets","maprdb.column.id" = "tid");

paragraphs.title: Total Tweet Counts by Hive
paragraphs.text:
%hive
select count(*) as count from mytweets

paragraphs.title: Number of tweets by screen names (Hive query)
paragraphs.text:
%hive
select screen_name,count(text) as count from mytweets group by screen_name order by count desc limit 10

paragraphs.title: Total tweets count by Spark
paragraphs.text:
%livy.spark
import com.mapr.db.spark._
import org.apache.hadoop.hive.maprdb._
val tweets=sc.loadFromMapRDB("/tmp/tweets")
val tDF=tweets.toDF()
tDF.createOrReplaceTempView("tTBL")
val df=spark.sql("select _id as id, screen_name,count(screen_name) c from tTBL group by _id,screen_name order by c desc")
//df.show(false)

msg.data: df: org.apache.spark.sql.DataFrame = [id: string, screen_name: string ... 1 more field]

paragraphs.text:
%livy.sql
select screen_name,count(text) as count from tTBL group by screen_name order by count desc limit 10

msg.data:

null	57047
